title: Fantasy football rankings for Week 9: Russell Wilson, Chris Carson form potent 1-2 punch for Seahawks
text:
CLOSE Charles Curtis gives you four fantasy things to know for Week 9. USA TODAY

Fantasy football rankings for Week 9 are based on the point-per-reception (PPR) scoring used in most seasonal and daily fantasy football formats. One point is awarded for every 10 rushing and receiving yards and one point for every 20 passing yards. Six points are awarded for touchdowns scored, four points for passing TDs and one point for receptions.

On bye: Atlanta, Cincinnati, L.A. Rams, New Orleans

Rankings are compiled by FantasySharks.com.

(*- Be sure to check injury/status before kickoff)

description: The Seattle Seahawks offense is flourishing on the arm of QB Russell Wilson and legs of RB Chris Carson. Their fantasy stock is up vs. the Buccaneers.
